Coming straight from NASAR PLANET, we are 8.000 high rewarding Aliens, arriving on Earth JANUARY 2022.

We’re unique digital collectibles, randomly generated from over 415 hand drawn traits.

We will leave our spaceships back, to install us on the IMX Platform, in the ETH LAYER 2 (which means NO GAS FEES!)

4 SPACESHIPS - 4 LANDINGS - 4 FACTIONS

Every 15 days after the launching date, a new Spaceship will land on Earth with a new faction of 2000 Aliens.

  • 0% - FIRST LANDING

    Arriving the first 2.000 aliens to the Earth.

    Launching Pre-Sale of 800 aliens. Whitelist with 400 spots.

    Future Breeding will only be possible between aliens of different spaceships.

  • 10% - PRE-SALE SOLD OUT

    Giveaway of 50 MyHeritage DNA kits.

  • 25% -SECOND LANDING (15 days later)

    Holders of the first spaceship will have preferential access to the pre-sale.

    CRYPTO-MINING FARM STARTS TO BE BUILD.

    Rewards directly to those who hold at least 3 Aliens of 2 or more spaceships.

  • 50% - THIRD LANDING (15 days later

    Holders of previous spaceships will have preferential access to the pre-sale.

    Donation of $10.000 to clean plastics from the oceans. (NGO collaboration)

  • 75% - FOURTH AND LAST LANDING - PARTY ALIENS

    PARTY ALIENS. - Party Aliens are the craziest Aliens out there. They are unique, weird, funny... Wholesome Aliens!!

    They will bring the wizardy to the project…;)

  • 100% - NASAR ALIENS ARE COMING TO THE METAVERSE

    Aliens will build their own space in the Metaverse, and build a Crypto-art Gallery for the community.

    Now Breeding is alive. Setup of the $NASR token.
